biotools.summary: Program for detecting the integrated copy number veriation regions (CNVRs) using population sequencing data. The high-confidence CNVRs are discovered and refined by both individual and population criteria. The result is a VCF format genotype file which can be used in GWAS/QLT research.

bioschemas.name: CNVcaller
